Observability of PLATO benchmark eclipsing binaries

From 2024-07-06 to 2024-11-03

Nights are labelled by the local date at sunset.

Plots run from sunset to sunrise.

Blue shading shows times of civil, nautical and astronomical twilight.

Phase 0 corresponds to the time of primary eclipse (transit).
